message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $2000000. It's a truly unique opportunity, and I believe its value to you will far exceed the asking price. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but considering my budget, I am unable to meet the $2000000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
